attributes.action: Set up a review of the professional conduct of MPs during PM's question time.
attributes.additional_details:
What occurred in PMQs on Wed 24th Feb 2016 as seen below was a clear illustration of inappropriate representation by unacceptable behaviour from those entrusted to debate nationally important subjects in what should be a professional and adult manner. Instead there is a tendency to constant jeering and shouting down comments and replies that illustrate a total lack of respect of the concept of debate and behaviour leaning to childishness.

http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-politics-35651000
attributes.background: PMQs is a very public opportunity to demonstrate the democratic process of debate in UK parliament. This is an opportunity on behalf of constituents and the nation for the people-elected representatives to raise core issues of the time with the PM. This should be illustration of deep sense of duty.
